This is a FFmpeg Win32 shared build made to be LGPLv2+ compliant.

FFmpeg version: 2.1.8
  libavutil      52. 48.101 / 52. 48.101
  libavcodec     55. 39.101 / 55. 39.101
  libavformat    55. 19.104 / 55. 19.104
  libavdevice    55.  5.100 / 55.  5.100
  libavfilter     3. 90.100 /  3. 90.100
  libswscale      2.  5.101 /  2.  5.101
  libswresample   0. 17.104 /  0. 17.104

This FFmpeg build was configured with:
  --disable-static
  --enable-shared
  --disable-w32threads

The source code for this FFmpeg build can be found at: <https://www.ffmpeg.org/olddownload.html>

This build was compiled on Debian stretch/stable (64-bit): <http://www.debian.org/>

GCC 6.3.0 was used to compile this FFmpeg build: <http://gcc.gnu.org/>

This build was compiled using the MinGW-w64 toolchain: <http://mingw-w64.sourceforge.net/>
